alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 7:53AM CDT until April 05 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JASPER AND JONES COUNTIES... At 753 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Heidelberg to near Ellisville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Heidelberg and Stafford Springs around 800 AM CDT. Mill Creek around 815 AM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for southeastern and east central Mississippi. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
